ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity
Class Spring

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.AbstractEntity
      ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.Spring
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
public class Spring
extends AbstractEntity

This class contains a physical object (the spring) and a springJoint, which applies the spring forces to the Platformer/Player, and to the spring, compressing and stretching it as desired

Author:
Christopher Keefer
